## TableBuilderOptions.width property

Total width of the table.

**Signature:**

```typescript
width?: number;
```

## Remarks

If not specified, the width is calculated from column widths.

When explicitly set to 0, the table has no width constraint and uses the sum of column widths. This is typically not useful since the default behavior already calculates width from columns - prefer omitting this option to use auto-calculated width.
